CustomField.description: A SOQL WHERE clause expression (without the "WHERE") that evaluates to "true" if a record should be deleted, for example, "Hand_Crafted_for_Demo_Scenario__c = false". Leave blank if all records of this object are to be deleted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A SOQL WHERE clause expression (without the "WHERE") that evaluates to "true" if a record should be deleted, for example, "Hand_Crafted_for_Demo_Scenario__c = false". Leave blank if all records of this object are to be deleted.
CustomField.label: SOQL WHERE Clause
